summary: "Prey" is a 2022 sci-fi movie set in 1719, part of the "Predator" series. It follows Naru, a young Comanche hunter who shields her tribe from an alien hunter and French fur traders threatening their survival. Filmed near Calgary, it features some dialogue in Comanche and French. The movie premiered in July 2022 and was well-received by critics. It's available on Hulu (U.S.) and Disney+/Star internationally.
title: Prey (2022 film)
